attributes.action: Ban completly the CRUEL practice of BATTERY HEN FARMING
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In this country as in many others the practice of Battery Farming is an ongoing thing which causes untold suffering to chickens for the whole of their short miserable lives.
They are kept in tiny cages,5 to a cage with the faeces of other birds falling onto cages below,they are unable to stretch their wings.
They have nothing to do other than peck the other 4 birds in the cage causing terrible wounds which are left untreated.
At 15 to 18 months of age these poor animals are slaughtered,put into chicken pies,baby food,dog food and stock cubes etc etc.
The eggs they produce at a cost to their sanity are sold to companies that manufacture cakes,mayonnaise and other human food,the buyers of which have no idea that they have been laying in faeces or next to dead birds.
Please help to stop this barbaric practice by signing this petition

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
